          <title>
            <string language="en">Distance and displacement</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Abstand und Distanzadresse</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Distance et déplacement</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Distância e deslocamento</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Distanza e spostamento</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Απόσταση και μετατόπιση</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Distancia y dislocación</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">This map illustrates the difference between distance and displacement. 'A hiker walks 15km, but is displaced by only 10km.</string>
          </description>
          <language>x-none</language>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">displacement</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">distance</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Map</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">position</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">travel</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <source>structureValues</source>
            <value>atomic</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Diese Karte veranschaulicht den Unterschied 
zwischen Abstand und Distanzadresse. ' ein Wanderer geht 15km, 
aber wird durch nur 10km verlegt.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Cette carte illustre la différence entre la 
distance et le déplacement. 'un randonneur marche 15km, mais 
est déplacé seulement de 10km.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Este mapa ilustra a diferença entre a distância
e o deslocamento. ' um hiker anda 15km, mas é deslocado por 
somente 10km.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Questo programma illustra la differenza fra la 
distanza e lo spostamento. 'un hiker cammina 15km, ma è 
spostato da soltanto 10km.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αυτός ο χάρτης επεξηγεί τη διαφορά μεταξύ της 
απόστασης και της μετατόπισης. "Ένας οδοιπόρος περπατά 
15km, αλλά μετατοπίζεται κατά μόνο 10km.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Esta correspondencia ilustra la diferencia entre 
la distancia y la dislocación. ' un hiker recorre el 15km, pero
es desplazado por el solamente 10km.</string>
          </description>
